movies_slide.title: Joker: Folie Ã  Deux
movies_slide.description:
Arthur Fleck returns in this haunting sequel, joined by Harley Quinn,
as they navigate the darker sides of Gotham and delve deeper
into their descent into madness.

movies_slide.title: Titanic
movies_slide.description:
A timeless love story unfolds aboard the ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic,
blending romance, drama, and historical tragedy.

movies_slide.title: It Chapter Two
movies_slide.description:
The Losers' Club reunites as adults to confront Pennywise,
who has returned to terrorize the town of Derry 27 years after their first encounter.

movies_slide.title: KGF Chapter 2
movies_slide.description:
After conquering the Kolar Gold Fields, Rocky must retain his supremacy
as he faces new foes and government forces determined to bring him down.

movies_slide.title: Interstellar
movies_slide.description:
A team of explorers travels through a wormhole in space in
an attempt to ensure humanity's survival as Earth faces environmental collapse.

movies_slide.title: Inspection
movies_slide.description:
A young recruit at a military academy must navigate a brutal training
process while confronting his past and his inner demons.
